headline: Republic Services, Inc. Sets Date for Third Quarter 2025 Earnings Release and Conference Call
summary: Republic Services, Inc. (NYSE: RSG) will release its third quarter financial results after market close on Thursday, Oct. 30, 2025, and host an investor conference call at 5 p.m. Eastern Time that day.

raw.headline: Republic Services, Inc. Sets Date for Third Quarter 2025 Earnings Release and Conference Call
raw.summary: Republic Services, Inc. (NYSE: RSG) will release its third quarter financial results after market close on Thursday, Oct. 30, 2025, and host an investor conference call at 5 p.m. Eastern Time that day.

headline: Republic Services' Recycled Plastic Flake Provides 54% Lower Carbon Footprint for Sustainable Packaging
summary: Republic Services, Inc. (NYSE: RSG), a leader in the environmental services industry, is producing recycled plastic flake from its Las Vegas Polymer Center for use in sustainable packaging that has a significantly lower carbon footprint (CO2e) than representative recycled polyethylene terephthalate (rPET) or virgin PET in the U.S. market. A recently completed product carbon footprint (PCF) study confirms its potential to help customers decarbonize supply chains and reduce Scope 3 emissions.
